title: Todo List App
desc: Discover my sleek todo list app - an old project showcasing seamless task management. Created six months ago, it reflects my passion for productivity and web development

title: Kurochi
desc: troducing our ambitious and thrilling anime site project! Our dedicated team has poured their hearts and expertise into creating a vast collection of free-to-watch animes. Although we are in the final stages, a few finishing touches remain. Get ready to immerse yourself in an extraordinary anime-watching experience soon! Stay tuned for the grand launch!
